org.jetel.graph.runtime.tracker

Class Log4jTokenTrackerSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.graph.runtime.tracker.Log4jTokenTrackerSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TokenEventListener, TokenTrackerSerializer

    public class Log4jTokenTrackerSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements TokenTrackerSerializer
    This token tracker serializer is dedicated to prints out all token events to log4j logger.
